Just cal me Dewy the nickname kind of grew on me (at first I wanted 
to be called firestorm). When I said "fairly weak" I meant as a 
standard. There must have been a few who are the more intellectual 
types like Veratis on the Maximals, but Veratis is still tough. I 
meant the kind of guy I can fight without embarrasing myself 
completely. And by the way where's Hugar, and why the freak did he 
approve a chimera? Dragon modes can come from mutant lizards, but 
Cloud said he wanted a chimera, and it was approved by Hugar.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Vincent Price" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> OOC: Fairly weak? I doubt anyone is going to do a fairly weak bot 
like you think. But you know what? YOU listen! It took me a year to 
gain respect in this RPG! It took several months before people would 
acknowledge my characters existed, and I have been treated bad for a 
long time, almost a year after my joining, because I didn't know 
anything about the RPG, wrote posts only thinking about myself, and 
posts that happened way too fast, and then wondered why people didn't 
reply. I didn't get the point, that they couldn't reply to my posts, 
because they were so confused. However, I never complained about it. 
I spoke up when I thought something was weird, and I defended myself, 
but I never complained or took shots at anyone for no reason. I had 
to be provoked before saying anything to anyone. In fact, when I 
didn't understand the rules, I broke one by mistake, and what did I 
get? Sorry that was a mode? No! I got "Listen you idiot." From 
Zardus! Hell, I gave JP a chance, and he rubbed my face in the dirt. 
You're going to have to get used to treating others how you want to 
be treated, Dewboy. It's a hard experience adapting to a new RPG, but 
I think your going about things all wrong if you want to be 
successful. I admire your determination, but you are still greedy, 
stubborn, and selfish. Oh, and Dewboy, one of the reasons I was hated 
so much, is because I typed in Caps...
> 
>   ----- Original Message -----
>   From: dewboy30816@y...
>   To: nbwrpg@y...
>   Sent: Thursday, November 22, 2001 3:16 PM
>   Subject: Re: Debate (important everyone read)
> 
> 
>   Listen, I HAVE 2 CHARS WAITING OUTSIDE THE INFECTICON BASE FOR 
>   SOMEONE WHO GIVE A RIP THEY EXIST, ANOTHER BACK AT THERE BASE NOT 
>   DOING ANYTHING, ANOTHER WAITING AT BLACKFORTRESS FOR THE VIRUS 
>   INCIDENT TO END SO SOMEONE WILL OPEN THE DOOR (OR RATHER RAISE 
THE 
>   SHIELDS), AND ONE THAT'S INSANE, SINCE I JOINED I HAVEN'T SLAGGED 
>   ANYONE, I WAS KIDDING ABOUT ALLORAN'S CHARS I JUST WANT A FAR 
FIGHT 
>   WITH A FAIRLY WEAK MAXIMAL, OH I FORGOT ONE BADLY WOUNDED, AND 
>   ANOTHER DEAD!
> 
>   --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Vincent Price" <thecode@p...> wrote:
>   > OOC: Forget it, you cheap ass, you've been a pain in my ass 
ever 
>   since you came in. I thought I was bad, but YOU, you are greedy, 
>   stubborn, and selfish. I repeat, you won't touch any of Alloran's 
old 
>   characters or Nemasis' new characters in a moding fashion...
>   > 
>   >   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   >   From: Kyle Stewart 
>   >   To: nbwrpg@y...

>   >   out a Maximal. By the way who's the weakest anyway? I
>   >   want a char on a major faction who's somewhere up in
>   >   the ranks.
>   > 
>   >   --- Vincent Price <thecode@p...> wrote:
>   >   > OOC: Hey, asshole! Yeah, you, Dewboy! Asshole! You
>   >   > won't frigging touch Alloran's characters unless you
>   >   > want to die a slow painful death. And you better
>   >   > have listened VERY carefully to what I said, too...
>   >   > 
>   >   >   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   >   >   From: dewboy30816@y... 
>   >   >   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   >   >   Sent: Thursday, November 22, 2001 7:45 AM
>   >   >   Subject: Re: Debate (important everyone read)
>   >   > 
>   >   > 
>   >   >   If you didn't hand them out does it mean all your
>   >   > chars just stopped 
>   >   >   in mid sentence and aren't moving. Time for some
>   >   > easy slaggin'.
>   >   > 
>   >   >   --- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
>   >   >   > OOC: Im leaving the RPG.  My life is getting
>   >   > busier, it isn't fun 
>   >   >   for me 
>   >   >   > anymore, and i have lost my creative drive.  Any
>   >   > of you may email me 
>   >   >   > privately, whenever you want.  I would love to
>   >   > keep in touch.  I 
>   >   >   will now 
>   >   >   > tell my history here, for those who don't know
>   >   > me as well as others. 
>   >   >    One 
>   >   >   > day, a year and a half ago, i was on Ben Yee's
>   >   > message board.  I 
>   >   >   came across 
>   >   >   > a post talking about Neo beast Wars RPG.  I had
>   >   > been looking to join 
>   >   >   an RPG, 
>   >   >   > but none of them interested me, until NBW.  When
>   >   > i joined, it was 
>   >   >   just a 
>   >   >   > mailing list.  Every day, people sent posts of
>   >   > the current list of 
>   >   >   members.  
>   >   >   > Eventually, we became part of egroups (now
>   >   > Yahoogroups), and were 
>   >   >   able to 
>   >   >   > gain a much larger amount of members.  When i
>   >   > joined, the council 
>   >   >   was 
>   >   >   > Yanshosh, Kslawdogg, JP3884, and Inferno371. 
>   >   > Soulstice was there 
>   >   >   too, then 
>   >   >   > being called "code," much to his disliking.  The
>   >   > Maximals were led 
>   >   >   by Liono 
>   >   >   > Prime, the Predacons by Hellbeast.  The Alliance
>   >   > was there, but it 
>   >   >   was far 
>   >   >   > smaller.  And so i began my long involvement.  I
>   >   > saw the tide turn 
>   >   >   both ways 
>   >   >   > in the war, and small custom factions spring up
>   >   > and then disapear.  
>   >   >   I saw my 
>   >   >   > fair share of idiots (ahh Icedemon), but there
>   >   > were also some great 
>   >   >   posters.  
>   >   >   > There was Dachande who started the Destrons,
>   >   > Logo, who had the 
>   >   >   hottest female 
>   >   >   > characters ever, my good friend shomin, with his
>   >   > psycho 
>   >   >   religiousness, 
>   >   >   > carnagedarkness, with (his/her? not sure) long,
>   >   > thinky posts with 
>   >   >   Dinobot, 
>   >   >   > and many others.  And let's not forget
>   >   > Minime_316, this RPG's only 
>   >   >   tragedy.  
>   >   >   > For those of you who don't know, Minime
>   >   > overdosed himself with 
>   >   >   pills.  To 
>   >   >   > make matters worse, that bastard JP beleived
>   >   > that the tragic email 
>   >   >   by his 
>   >   >   > brother was fake.  Oh, and KSL, im not angry
>   >   > that your characters 
>   >   >   murdered 
>   >   >   > Soundwave, don't worry about it.  For those that
>   >   > didn't like me, 
>   >   >   well then 
>   >   >   > good for you, but for my friends here, feel free
>   >   > to talk to me 
>   >   >   whenever you 
>   >   >   > want.  I'll always remember Neo Beast Wars RPG.
>   >   >   > 
>   >   >   > Another turning point
>   >   >   > A fork stuck in the road
>   >   >   > Time grabs you by the wrist
>   >   >   >  Directs you where to go
>   >   >   > So make the best of this test and don't ask why
>   >   >   > It's not a question but a lesson learned in time
>   >   >   > It's something unpredictable
>   >   >   > But in the end is right
>   >   >   > I hope you had the time of your life
>   >   >   > 
>   >   >   > So take the photographs and stillframes in your
>   >   > mind
>   >   >   > Hang it on a shelf in good health and good time
>   >   >   > Tattoos of memories and deadskin on trial
>   >   >   > For what it's worth it was worth all the while
>   >   >   > It's something unpredictable
>   >   >   > But in the end is right
>   >   >   > I hope you had the time of your life
>   >   >   > 
>   >   >   > It's something unpredictable
>   >   >   > But in the end is right
>   >   >   > I hope you had the time of your life
>   >   >   > 
>   >   >   > ~Alloran
